hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Wind Enemy Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

HC (Malon).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Shadow Temple Compass# and #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Deku Stick# and #Magic Beans#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Ice Arrows#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Under Grave Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.
